comment:
After reviewing the code provided by the Programming Expert, I have identified a potential issue in the implementation. The function `prob_275` is defined multiple times with the same code, which can lead to confusion and redundancy. It is recommended to have a single implementation of the function to avoid duplication and maintain code consistency.

Additionally, the code lacks proper documentation and comments to explain the purpose of the function, input parameters, and expected output. It is essential to include descriptive comments to improve code readability and maintainability.

Furthermore, the function does not utilize the input parameters `chemical_A` and `chemical_B` in the optimization model. These parameters should be incorporated into the model to allow for dynamic input values and improve the flexibility of the function.

Overall, the code can be enhanced by consolidating the function implementation, adding comprehensive documentation, and utilizing the input parameters effectively in the optimization model. These improvements will contribute to better code quality and clarity.
